actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: A bill to provide for the appointment of alternates for the Governors of the International Monetary Fund and of the International Bank for Reconstruction and Development.

summary.text: Provides for the appointment of alternates for the governors of the International Monetary Fund and of the International Bank for Reconstruction and Development. (Amends 22 U.S.C. 286a)

titles.title: A bill to provide for the appointment of alternates for the Governors of the International Monetary Fund and of the International Bank for Reconstruction and Development.
